heading: HR00419
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO IMMEDIATELY INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE NUMEROUS COSTS AND LIABILITIES THAT THE POWER SECTOR ASSETS AND LIABILITIES MANAGEMENT CORPORATION (PSALM) IS TRYING TO PASS ON TO ELECTRICITY CONSUMERS
